label: City HQ
definition: City included in provider's contact address

label: 2018 Passenger Volume
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Motorbus (MB), Bus Rapid Transit (RB), Cable Car (CC), Commuter Bus (CB), Commuter Rail (CR), Heavy Rail (HR), Hybrid Rail (YR), Inclined Plane (IP), Jitney (JT), Light Rail (LR), Monorail/Automated  Guideway (MG), Streetcar Rail (SR), Trolleybus (TB), Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: 2018 Passenger Volume (Demand Response)
definition: 2018 Total Unlinked Passenger Trips, Demand Response
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: 2018 Vehicles Operating at Maximum Service
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Motorbus (MB), Bus Rapid Transit (RB), Cable Car (CC), Commuter Bus (CB), Commuter Rail (CR), Heavy Rail (HR), Hybrid Rail (YR), Inclined Plane (IP), Jitney (JT), Light Rail (LR), Monorail/Automated  Guideway (MG), Streetcar Rail (SR), Trolleybus (TB), Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: 2018 Vehicles Operating at Maximum Service (Demand Response)
definition: 2018 Vehicles Operating at Maximum Service, Demand Response
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: 2018 Total Passenger Fare Revenue
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Motorbus (MB), Bus Rapid Transit (RB), Cable Car (CC), Commuter Bus (CB), Commuter Rail (CR), Heavy Rail (HR), Hybrid Rail (YR), Inclined Plane (IP), Jitney (JT), Light Rail (LR), Monorail/Automated  Guideway (MG), Streetcar Rail (SR), Trolleybus (TB), Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: 2018 Total Passenger Fare Revenue (Demand Response)
definition: 2018 Total Passenger Fare Revenue, Demand Response
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: GTFS Static Feed
definition: URL for most recent static General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) feed

label: GTFS Realtime Service Alerts
definition: URL for most recent service alerts component of real-time GTFS feed

label: GTFS Realtime Trip Updates
definition: URL for most recent trip-updates component of real-time GTFS feed

label: GTFS Realtime Vehicle Locations
definition: URL for most recent vehicle-locations component of real-time GTFS feed
